text: NeXT Inc. was an American computer and software company. It was created after Steve Jobs quit his job at Apple Inc.. It was a failure but it did get him back at Apple and as CEO. Mac OS X's core was based entirely on the NeXT computer. Apple bought NeXT for $429 million. Steve Jobs used $12 million of his own money to make NeXT and it did pay off because he got his job back. ==References== Category:Companies based in California Category:Defunct companies of the United States Category:American technology companies
title: NeXT
